Posts.Content: Hi Karen, Thanks for your reply & yes I'm very happy with the news. I think I will still go for the mastectomy too be honest Karen, I am also BRCA 2 positive so want to give myself the best possible chance. Hope your well & good luck with your journey. Love Cheryl Xx
Posts.Title: Light at the end of the tunnel

Posts.Content: Hi All, Thought I would share my good news with you all. So after thinking long and hard shall I have chemo before surgery, the results are paying off. I did decide to have chemo first and just after having 2 chemo sessions my lump has shrunk from 5cm's to 2.5cm's. Wow I feel like I've won the lottery. We can do this, keep fighting, laughing & loving everyone. Love Cheryl XxX
Posts.Title: Light at the end of the tunnel

Posts.Content: Hi Lynn, Yes it does feel like excellent news! My family we're a little upset with me for choosing chemo first. They thought I would want to remove the cancer first, but now I've given them the news they are over the moon. Cheryl Xx
Posts.Title: Light at the end of the tunnel

Posts.Content: Hi Lynn, I will thank you, cycle 4 on Monday ( half way through ) makes it all worth while. I never imagined it would shrink so much. I'm over the moon! Take Care Cheryl Xx
Posts.Title: More Good News...

Posts.Content: Hi G n' J, Thank you and your spot on, still dreading the week to come after chemo but for now clinging on to the news and will remind myself again 1 week post next Mondays chemo. Cheryl Xx
Posts.Title: More Good News...

Posts.Content: Hi All, I went for my oncology check up before my 4th session of Chemo yesterday, only to be told my lump has shrunk again. 3 weeks ago it had gone from 5cm to 2.5cm and yesterday I was told it is less than 1cm. Wow I couldn't believe it, the news actually made me cry. With 5 sessions to go, hopefully it keeps shrinking. Feel fantastic.... Love Cheryl Xx
Posts.Title: More Good News...

Posts.Content: Hi There, Not sure if this will help or not due to I'm only starting chemo tomorrow, but my first oncology appointment I was told I will have another appointment half way through FECT just before I start T, it will be a check up, MRI scan to see if chemo is working as it should and then discuss possible side affects to the T.  Wishing you the very best of luck! Cheryl xx
Posts.Title: Appointment With Chemo Consultant Halfway Thro My Chemo's ??
